articles.title: Scientists create vaccine for FENTANYL - the frighteningly potent opioid killing 200 Americans - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Houston have developed a fentanyl vaccine that prevents the drug from reaching the brain of rats. They hope to launch human trials for it next year.
articles.content:
A new vaccine may be able to totally block the effects of fentanyl potentially saving thousands of Americans from overdoses each year.
